vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μεμβράνα, ἡ,
= Latin membrāna, parchment, [NT+2nd c.AD+]:—also μέμβρανον, τό, [Refs 6th c.AD+]: hence adjective μεμβράϊνος, [Refs 6th c.AD+], and substantive μεμβραϊνάριος, probably in [Refs 6th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: parchment, a fine animal leather specially prepared for use in making scrolls
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
parchment, a fine animal leather specially prepared for use in making scrolls
parchment, vellum, 2Tim. 4:13*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: pergamino (un documento o material en el cual se puede escribir)
